animation_style.description: Modern, clean 2D cartoon aesthetic with thick outlines, vibrant colors, and child-friendly proportions. Characters have slightly exaggerated features with larger heads and eyes for expressiveness. Clean, bold outlines with smooth shading using subtle gradients. Backgrounds are simplified but clearly defined settings.
art_characteristics: Thick, well-defined outlines (dark brown or black)
Flat, vibrant, saturated colors with soft shading
Large, expressive eyes with prominent pupils and white highlights
Simple, rounded shapes for natural elements
Clean geometric forms for man-made objects
Cheerful, innocent, and inviting overall feel
